content: Give me a list of 20 words that have 'ght' somewhere in them.

Sure! Here is a list of 20 words that contain "ght" somewhere in them:

1. Light
2. Flight
3. Right
4. Sight
5. Night
6. Fright
7. Tight
8. Bright
9. Weight
10. Height
11. Daughter
12. Eight
13. Weightless
14. Plight
15. Knight
16. Glimpse
17. Thought
18. Fought
19. Sought
20. Caught

I hope this helps! If you need any more words or have any other questions, feel free to ask.
